mainText: Thanks for tuning in. This message was recorded on Sunday, May eleventh. The South Carolina State House rally on Saturday May tenth was attended by the few and the brave. Representative Kambrell Garvin has a Town Hall on Monday, May twelth at 6 p m at Doko Manor in Blythewood. For more details, call 8 0 3, 2 1 2, 6 8 7 5.
